message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $10,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I think the price is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $7,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more than your offer. I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
